overview: The Pure Girls are an all female production house that brings you a DVD full of hardcore girl/girl action. See Angel Long and Lolly Badcock give Michelle B the telling off she deserves for being such a goodie two shoes. Watch Sasha Rose get pounded by her teacher whilst she's in detention. Sweet girl Suzie Best loves to stay behind when she has been naughty cause she fancies her teacher and decides to ask him to help with her spelling, What does horny mean sir?
title: Bad Girls In Detention
